pageContext.claim: “I caught all of this corruption that was going on, and nobody else could have done it.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump doesn't specify which corruption he is exposing. Generally speaking, white collar crimes prosecutions are at some of the lowest levels ever. At least five Trump advisors have been charged or pleaded guilty in criminal cases. Eleven other administration officials have been found to have misspent taxpayer dollars, violated ethics rules or had issues with security clearances. By contrast, no one from the Obama administration was indicted.
